Summary: I saw a oval disc shape with a row of lights that pulsed or blinked all in a fig or mist that changed direction and from horizontal to vertical
trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around November 28th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI am not sure I should send this, but am a little freaked out right now. I am in Memphis, TN, I was just out in my backyard taking my dog out and I swear I saw something I can not explain! I have no evidence or other witness, but I swear I just saw at about 10:20pm a ring of lights that seemed to be in a fog, they turned from horizontal to vertical, first headed East, then when they turned vertical, they went North across the sky. They seemed to be in a fog, or a mist....if I hadn't looked at the right moment, I would have missed them....I can not believe I am sitting here on Thanksgiving night having just seen something so crazy! I am not asking you to believe me, just please please tell me if you hear a similar report from anybody else!
